data.name: ّپیشرو گزین پارس
data.description: MSELECT is a Staffing and Training agency with offices in London, Dubai, Erbil, Basra, Sulaimaniya and Tehran, we provide the below services for the largest international corporations.   Our services include: Recruitment - Permanent, Contract, and Temporary Contractor Management Managed Services HR Consultancy Training & Development
